tier.item: It appears that dao3 and sui4 are monomorphemic (21) a. wo3 kan4 jian4 shu4 dao3 zhai4
verbs that express change of state. In order for my claims I see perceive tree fall at
to be correct, I would have to demonstrate that such verbs lu4 bian1
are actually derived from more basic forms. Indeed, this road side
is the case: the examples above are derived from underly- `I see the fallen tree at the side of the road.'
ing stative predicates--the particle le signals inchoativity. (tree may have fallen a long time ago)
